inn1.comm: gets good bounce straight away, outside off and it really climbed towards the keeper
bat on ball for the first time, full outside off and he drags the ball onto the pitch and down to cover
good use of the wrists from Amla, drifting on the legs and whipped behind square, fine leg is a bit square
this one was bang on the middle stump and he does well to stay back and defend
on the stumps and he stays back and clips it to the leg side
hits a good length on middle and leg and he works it to the on side
the first one of the series! This was a half volley swinging on the pads, he just gently clipped it away wide of midwicket
this was on a good length on the off stump, not much room and safely defended
gets some late swing away from the left-hander and de Kock wasn't quite sure with his defense, played it with soft hands
Bhuvneshwar's late swing again, de Kock did well to watch it through and play it late
a bit too straight this time and it's on the pads and he works it wide of square leg
that was a poor ball, 130 kph, too short and wide outside off, he had a lot of width and he neatly punches it past the massive gap at cover
short of a length and he defends to the off side
another poor ball and put away! Short and wide outside off, very friendly line and length and he stays back and easily punches it wide of cover
he stays back at the crease and punches it to the off side
much better line, this was a shade wide of the off stump and came back in, he didn't offer a shot
this was fuller in length on the off stump and driven down to mid-off
this was a bit too full outside off and he went forward and gently pushed it wide of cover, Jadeja chases
this was full outside off and punched down to mid-off
gets away with a short and wide one, 135 kph, he had to reach out and he ended up chopping it down to backward point
much better line, closer to the off stump and punched down the track
De Kock flashes at one this time, it was pitched up and moving away and he went for the drive, nearly edged it
keeps it nice and straight and he defends this one
De Kock's been in good touch! He pounces on a friendly half volley outside off, comes forward and pushes it wide of mid-off and cover
good length outside off and defended
solid punch by Amla and straight to cover point, the timing was super but for no runs though
he gets an inside edge to the pads as he looks to defend
chance for a run out! Amla pushed a full delivery in front of mid-off and risked a single to Dhawan who missed the stumps
he stays right behind the line and punches it to the off side
full and wide outside the off stump, de Kock goes for the drive and plays it uppishly wide of backward point
comes round the wicket, de Kock goes back, opens the face and runs it down to third man
nice inward movement there, Amla gets behind, shuffles and defends
beats him! That was a good one from Bhuvi, landed on the seam outside off and just about moved away, nearly took the edge
134 kph, lands it on a good length and he stays back and punches it to the off side
that was neatly punched away but he can't beat cover point
he goes back and punches this one to the off side
this was a fraction too short, de Kock had the time to stay back and pull this one over square leg, not the right length
133 kph, false shot, extra bounce and de Kock was slashing at it outside off, nearly edge it

slashed to third man and Shami takes it on the half volley! This was short and wide outside off, slashed to square third man, the ball dipped and Shami dived, he knew that he didn't take it on the full, he was honest, good fielding attempt nevertheless

and almost another one! Two consecutive half volley catches would you believe it? Amla gets a leading edge towards Rohit at cover point, he dives and it just dropped short, Rohit too was certain it wasn't clean and doesn't want to have it checked
fullish on the off stump and defended
a bit too straight and worked towards fine leg
Amla stays back at the crease and punches it to the off side
not for the first time this evening Amla punches one straight to extra cover, good looking shot but for no runs
133 kph, keeps it on a good length and he defends
134.5 kph, this was moving away and he had some width, punched down to cover
the bowler loses his line and drifts very wide down the leg side, Amla tries to whip it away
and after several tries Amla finally finds that gap! Too short and wide outside off, there was a big gap at cover and Amla picked that with ease with a back foot punch
heads up! Bhuvneshwar bowls it on his pads, all Amla had to do was whip it effortlessly over deep midwicket, went a few rows behind, looked like it hit the scoreboard
drifts on the pads and he knocks it off his legs
now Amla just looks unstoppable, good length outside off but too generous with the width, reached out and slapped it wide of backward point, rocketed off the bat
good comeback by Mohit as he got this one to come back in and square him up on the pads
he swings it on the pads and Amla works it to square leg
not the right length with the mid-off up, too full and all de Kock had to do was push it with little force wide of mid-off
drifts on the pads and he gently works it towards midwicket and sets off
this one moves away off the pitch and keeps low before reaching the keeper
141.9 kph, on a good length on the off stump and defended
little shorter in length and he stays back at the crease and works it to the on side
136 kph, de Kock was squared up there, he wanted to work it to the on side but decided late to defend
skids through and hits him high on the pad, de Kock not at ease against Shami
good over from Shami, the batsman stays back and punches it to midwicket
131.8 kph, shapes to drive but mistimes it to the off side
beats him on the drive, full outside off and looked to drive straight and Amla was playing a bit too far from the body, went between bat and pad
looked like an edge but in fact it was late away movement that squared him up, went back and looked to push it to the off side, beaten
he brings this one back in and works it to the on side
comes round the wicket and he stays back and punches it wide of point
this was fullish outside off and he pushes it to point
de Kock continues to struggle against Shami, this was short outside off and de Kock was looking to pull but backed out, extra bounce there
inside edge! Lucky escape for de Kock at the ball just beat the stumps and raced to fine leg, really didn't cover the line
tucks it to the on side and looks to get off the strike
140 kph, and de Kock just about gets off the strike! Nudged it to short square leg and set off quickly, he had to dive at the crease and the throw was wide
bowls it on a fullish length outside off and he safely leaves it alone
Shami digs it in short but drifts down the leg side, 141 kph
this was short and wide outside the off stump, punched past the big gap at cover and the sweeper picks up
good running, punched with soft hands towards point and they call for the run immediately
good length outside the off stump and he punches it to the off side
lands outside off and moves away from him and he safely leaves it alone
stays back at the crease and knocks it to the on side
stays back and dabs it down to third man
Amla trapped high on the pads by one that kicked up and moved back in, the ball dropped short of slip
he bangs it in short and he safely ducks under it
bangs it in short of a length and Amla stays right back and defends
he shuffles at the crease and clips it with the angle down to midwicket and sets off
good length on the stumps and tucked to the on side
139 kph, bangs it in short down the leg side, pulled away with force but straight to fine leg
a bit too straight on the pads and he shuffles and works it away down to fine leg who's square
he goes back at the crease and knocks it to the on side
round the wicket to de Kock and he drives it back to the bowler
slashed wide of slip, he gave him width, little bit of turn already and he cuts him down to third man
more in control this time, shorter in length and de Kock had time to cut him wide of the off-side ring at point
he comes forward and defends
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
this was short and wide outside off and he cuts him straight to sweeper cover who's there to plug this shot
keeps it straight and he stays back and defends
bit too straight, 138 kph, clips it behind square and walks the single
he stays right behind the line and punches it towards cover, Shami operating in the late 130s, early 140s
138 kph, fullish and wider outside off and left alone to the keeper
drifting a bit on the pads and he clips him away down to square leg
tossed up and he gets forward and defends
fullish and wide outside off and he drives him down to deep cover
round the wicket to Amla, he tucks it down to square leg
drifting on the pads and he works it to the on side
tossed up and he gets forward and defends
this was shorter and gently nudged away down to square leg
and well not too far from a wicket there! This one stops on de Kock and he gets a leading edge to the off side
pushes it down to deep extra cover for a single
drifts down the leg side and he safely runs it down to fine leg
he goes back at the crease and punches him down to sweeper cover
sweeper cover into play again, bit too short and wide outside off and he pushes it past the infield
he goes back at the crease and defends to the off side
tossed up and he pushes it to the deep on the off side to bring up his fifty!
continues round the wicket, easily worked away to deep midwicket
drifting on the pads and worked away to the on side
this was dropped short and he pulled him down to deep square
tossed up on the off stump and defended
easily worked to deep midwicket, not sure what Ashwin's trying to achieve by bowling round the wicket to the right-hander
132 kph, gives him width outside off and chopped to the off side
doesn't bowl at the stumps, gives him width and he cuts to the deep
Amla tries to improvise and nearly gives his wicket away, he walks across his stumps on seeing the line and slashes and misses
pushes it to the off side and beats the diving backward point fielder, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end
134.7 kph, funny old over, wide outside off and de Kock follows Amla's lead in shuffling and chasing it and he misses
tossed up and he drives down the track
chips down the track and drives to cover and well stopped by Raina
fires it flat on the pads and he works it to midwicket
slower through the air but on the pads and clipped to deep square leg
he goes back at the crease and punches it to cover
tossed up and he goes back and punches it to the off side
tossed up and he gets forward and knocks it to midwicket
he goes back and punches it to the off side
short arm pull! Ashwin dropped this a fraction too short and he picked the length early and cleared midwicket., 100 stand up
attempts the same shot but this was flatter and just short of midwicket
made a bit of room and drove it to cover
tossed up and he gets forward and defends
tossed up and he gets forward and drives to the bowler
tossed up and he drives to the off side
that's a lovely shot! It was tossed up and de Kock was down the track and adjusted late, drove it wide of cover
attempts the reverse sweep and he can't beat point
comes forward and clips it to the on side
comes forward and drives him down to long-on
continues round the wicket, this was dropped shorter outside off and he moved back and punched it hard wide of cover, big gap there
over the wicket and he gets forward and defends
clips it with the turn to deep square leg
defends this to the on side
plays it late to the off side and thinks of a single
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
tossed up on the pads and worked down to long-on
gets to his fifty with a gentle push down to long-off! His 23rd fifty in ODIs
full on the pads and gently pushes it to long-on
pushes it rather late to cover, easy singles here
stays back at the crease and knocks it down to square leg
gets down to sweep rather early but he gets enough on it to beat short fine leg with ease, not the right line
it skids through and he defends it
he goes back at the crease and punches it to the off side
looked like the carrom ball, punched to the off side
he was in full control this time! Tossed up on the pads and he sweeps and clears short fine leg, neatly chipped over the fielder
spin leaking a few runs here, tossed up outside off and he lofts this one over extra cover, finds the big gap
pushes this one towards sweeper cover
he comes down the track and clips it towards cover
skids through and he plays it late to the off side
goes back and places it wide of cover
tossed up and he goes back and punches it wide of cover
tossed up and he drives this one to long-off
slower through the air and played with soft hands
stays back and clips with the turn to short midwicket
comes forward and drives to long-on
tossed up, defended forward
ends the over with a half volley, outside off and he places it well wide of cover, India struggling to make a breakthrough
tossed up and he comes forward and drives to deep cover
msfield by Raina at midwicket allows a single
Jadeja dives to his left and cuts off a single
goes back at the crease and punches him down to point
punches him down to long-on
he goes back at the crease and punches it to sweeper cover
starts off with a full and wide one outside off and he punches it towards sweeper cover where Dhawan has some work to do
De Kock makes room and comes down the track and gets an outside edge that flies over the vacant slips region, third man was fine

well the Powerplay brings a wicket but it wasn't off a forceful shot! Shami tucked him up for room outside off, Amla was half-hearted in his attempt to run that square on the off side, ended up getting an inside edge to the stumps, the off stump was pegged back slightly
starts off with a bouncer and he ducks under it
this was on a good length outside off and he left that alone
fullish and moving away and he leaves it alone
from round the wicket and he strays really wide down the leg side
129 kph, nearly another wicket! De Kock cramped for room and yet looking to cut, he nearly edges it
hits a good length outside off and he punches it to the off side
this was fuller in length outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
this was on a good length outside off and he punches it to sweeper cover
edged to third man! De Kock has some width to work with, Shami gets it to move away and he slashes and no slip, safe shot in the end
he goes the other way this time! Drifts down the leg side and de Kock swivels and pulls firmly wide of short fine leg, he's on 92
136 kph, Kallis starts to open up, gifted a short and wide one first up, arches backwards and cracks it over backward point
much better line and length, pitched up outside off and left alone
nearly squared him up there with a fuller one on the pads, swings in late and hits his pads and that was missing leg
fullish in length on the off stump and placed to sweeper cover
drifts on the pads and he works it down to midwicket
brings this one back in and de Kock defends, the ball drops in front of him
Kallis gets a jaffa! Extra bounce and movement and Kallis was squared up, nearly edged it and he smiles in acknowledgment
Shami creating opportunities here! Another one moves away late and nearly takes the edge as Kallis wafts
gets some bat on it for a change and he pushes it to the off side
140 kph, Kallis breaks the shackles, Kallis makes room and lofts a pitched up delivery over cover point
spooned to cover! It was a similar pitched up delivery outside off like the previous one and Kallis looked to chip it over the infield, hits straight to Jadeja
on the stumps and AB manages to drive him down the track
he oversteps! Pushes this one down to mid-off, free hit coming up
Free Hit deposited for a six over wide long-on! He made room and was expecting a length ball to punish and he got it
this was on a good length outside off and he punches it down to deep point
tucks it away to the on side to get off the mark
fullish outside off and he pushes this one down to cover
and he gets his second ODI hundred with a single down to square leg! Tucked away and sets off, a century off just 101 balls
drifts on the body and he knocks it down to square leg
AB looks to press on by chipping down the track but Shami bowls it shorter and beats him
tucks him up for room on the stumps and he works it to the off side
it skids through and he chops it to the off side
take that! This was a half volley and AB drilled that very firmly wide of the bowler and mid-off, rocketed off the bat
good length outside off and he drills it to cover
he goes back at the crease and punches it to long-on
goes back and punches it to the on side, fielded at mid-on
Ashwin pauses before delivery, drills a low full toss down the track and deflects off the bowler
goes back and pulls a shorter one to deep midwicket
he stays back at the crease and knocks it to square leg
full on the pads and drilled down to long-on
length ball on middle stump, driven off the front foot towards long-off
backs away from the stumps and absolutely murders that over midwicket, flat and powerful hit
spinning in towards the stumps, pokes it behind point
that one stopped on him a touch, and perhaps bounced more than he expected, the ball is in the air for a bit but lands well short of mid-off
skips down the track and looks to sweep but is hit on the pads
pushed towards cover to end the over
clipped towards square leg for a single
waits on the back foot and pats that behind point for another single
slanting towards leg stump, worked behind square leg
drops it short, drilled towards long-on for a single
sliding down the leg side, lucky that wasn't put away for four, swiped behind square leg for a single
an over of singles, eased towards long-on
flatter delivery and he punches this one down to long-off
tries the reverse sweep and and gets an inside edge to the pads
makes room and punches this one wide of cover
tossed up and he drives him down to long-off
delicately played! This was flatter outside off and skidded through, made room and placed it wide of short third man
jogs a single down to midwicket
pauses before delivery, de Kock sweeps a bit too early and the ball clips the pad and rolls away
tossed up and he gets forward and drives to the off side
good improv, pauses before delivery, de Kock comes down the track and lofts inside out over cover, he adjusted well
stays back and works it to deep square leg
goes back and punches square of the wicket on the off side
he goes back and cuts square on the off side
nearly cleaned up de Kock there! AB chipped down the track and lofted it flat and fierce down the ground wide of long-on who can't cut it off
less power, same result, tossed up down the leg side and he adjusts well by sweeping and finds the gap at fine leg
takes a single down to long-off
mid-off was up, de Kock came down the track and lofted this one safely over the infield, a few bounces and four
makes room and drives to Dhawan at sweeper cover
loosener outside off which AB pushes to the off side
shuffles across and clips it towards square leg
shuffles across and drives him down to sweeper cover
shot! Tossed up on the pads and de Kock stays at the crease and blasts this one over wide long-on

the bowling change brings a wicket! After getting smashed for a huge six, Kohli bowls it slower on the pads and de Kock plays a loose drive, chipping it back to the bowler, lucky bowling change by Dhoni, de Kock goes back for a fine 135
fullish on the pads and drilled to long-on
gives it a lot of air and he drives him down to long-on
tossed up on the pads and he works it down to square leg
goes back and punches it back to the bowler
tossed up and he works it to square leg
gets forward and drives to cover
Duminy squared up on the pads as he looked to play it to the on side
stays back and slices it to the off side
drills a low full toss towards long-on
excellent running there as he takes the first run quickly after beating square leg
this was smashed down to deep extra cover and Jadeja was quite stupendous at the boundary to cut that off
gets forward and drives him to long-off
opens the face of the bat and steers it down to point for a single
that was slapped so hard you could be forgiven if you didn't see it! Down the track to a length ball and bashed down to deep cover
shuffled a long way across and looked to slap it to the on side but ended up playing a forehand to mid-off
looks to squeeze this one down to third man and he can't beat the keeper
another brilliant inside out loft! Even Duminy uses his feet to Mohit, round the wicket, length ball and scooped over deep cover, several rows back
superb improv this time! Duminy moves across his stumps and adjusts well by scooping the medium pacer well over short fine leg
makes room to a fuller one and he drills it down to deep cover
had AB in a tangle there, may have been surprised by the extra bounce as he arched back and placed it to third man
he bangs this one short and its the one bouncer for the over, it was a good bouncer though
take that! Length ball on the stumps, Duminy stays at the crease,makes room and thrashes it straight and just over the straight rope
Shami punished yet again for bowling length, ideal for Duminy to clear his front leg and send it several rows over deep square leg
comes back well with a slower ball, dabbed to the off side
makes room to a full ball and drills it down to long-on
it's raining sixes here! A full toss gets punished, AB makes room and sends it a long way over wide long-off
wide outside off and he chases but misses
gets to his fifty with another mighty hit over long-off! Length ball outside off, makes room and it's a flatter hit, 300 up
comes down the track and gets an inside edge to the on side
20 off the over! Length ball on middle and leg and deposited over wide long-on, when will the bowlers learn never to bowl length?
that's more the length Shami should look to bowl, yorker length and Duminy can only squeeze it out for a single to the off side
raw power, bends and blasts this fuller one down to long-off
losing count of the number of sixes here, this was short, Duminy bent forward and smacked this one some rows back over deep square leg
it's a low full toss and he drills this one down to wide long-on
full and wide outside off and he squirts it out to cover and he brings up his fifty! Off just 25 balls
the ball's flying everywhere! This was short and wide outside off and he made room and deliberately slashed this over short third man
makes room and swings and gets an inside edge and even a diving Dhoni can't stop it, short fine leg chases
AB was targeting that on side boundary for a while, he finally connects, length delivery punished again, one bounce down to deep midwicket
can't believe that went for a six! That was flat I tell you! AB makes room, it was a fuller ball and yet he improvised and sliced it just over the deep point rope, amazing
down the ground this time! Bends down for a low full toss and bashes it flat and towards the sight screen, Dhawan dives in despair
slower ball and wide outside off,  AB makes room for the slog, outside edge clears the keeper and Ashwin manages to dive and stop it
drills a fuller ball down to midwicket
stupendous! Only way to describe that! AB shuffles across the stumps and treats Shami like a spinner, fetches the ball from outside off and sweeps him over fine leg, talk about control

AB not so lucky this time! Attempts to slog him over fine leg again, moves across his stumps and exposes all three, the ball goes straight through and knocks down the off stump, lands a few yards back
the carnage continues! Miller gets a fuller ball outside off and he plays an expansive drive and finds the gap at third man
clips a fuller delivery down to deep square leg
an anti-climax here as the final ball is just a single, clipped down to deep midwicket

inn2.comm: 137.7 kph, seemed quicker than that, lands outside off and he safely leaves it alone, good carry
beautiful shape away from the right-hander, tentatively forward and poked his bat out
139 kph, this was fuller and moving away from him, Rohit does well to leave these alone
136 kph, pace coupled with movement, concentration  needed, Rohit had to play at it and was lucky the edge wasn't found
Rohit's being tested already, pitched on a good length on the off stump and moved away, nearly shaved the face of the bat
this was shorter and still moving away, late 130s on an average this over, Rohit plays out a maiden and not bat on ball yet
Dhawan too leaves this one alone, lands outside the off stump and moves away
this one comes back in and just sails over the off stump! Brave leave and good carry
that should release a lot of pressure, Tsotsobe errs by bowling a half volley and thrashed down the ground wide of mid-off
131 kph, not the quickest ball but there was more bounce than expected, nearly edged that to the keeper
this was shorter and Dhawan hopped to punch that but couldn't beat cover
this one straightens outside off and Dhawan pushes his pad forward and leaves it alone
Steyn persists with that length, outside off, full and moving away and left alone
139.9 kph, action replay, fullish outside the off stump and leaves the right-hander
fires it full and a touch wide outside off and Rohit is still patient, he's waiting for that fuller length
bangs that full outside off and he moves it away, de Kock's gloves taking a hammering already
yet another one that leaves the right-hander and he safely leaves it alone
and he plays out another maiden, Rohit's happy to bide his time against Steyn, gets the same shape
extra bounce for Tsotsobe, outside off and Dhawan does well to leave it alone
delightful! Dhawan has put away another half volley and bisected the gap between mid-off and cover, balance was perfect
from elegance to power! This was short and wide outside the off stump, poor length and duly spanked over backward point
switches to a good length on middle and he solidly defends this on the back foot
good length outside off and he safely leaves it alone
Dhawan cannot take strike the next over! He chooses to let this one go outside off, Rohit to face the music again
the pressure getting to Rohit? He fished at it outside off as the ball climbed and left him
forget a nervous Rohit, this would have troubled even the best in these conditions! Lands on off and middle, bounces and nearly shaves the glove, had to play at it, top class pace bowling
now Steyn bowls it fuller and Rohit nearly edges it again, poked forward
BAT ON BALL, within the line of the stumps and he steers it to the off side, Rohit smiles
leading edge! Not in control at all, this was moving towards the pads and by some fluke the edge beat cover
confusion! He steered this to point and set out of his crease and changed his mind, Dhawan had to hurry back and the throw was wide
the bouncer claims Dhawan and Morkel strikes first ball! Morkel hits the deck hard, Dhawan wants to pull but gets a top edge, de Kock runs several yards to his right and takes the skier
this one angles back in and he doesn't offer a shot
pace and bounce! The test continues, Rohit does well to get his glove out of the way, that one kicked up
now cleverly varies his length by bowling the fuller one, Rohit pushes forward to drive and nearly edges it
140 kph, another good delivery that tucks him up for room and he doesn't play at it
a shorter one closer to the off stump and he doesn't play at it
now Kohli is watchful outside the off stump with Steyn, moves away from the off stump
he bowls this one fuller on the off stump and Kohli is solid in defense
that was a really quick bouncer and de Kock was simply brilliant to leap and collect that
awesome stuff from Steyn, has the best ODI batsman in a tangle, outside off and just leaves the right-hander, don't ask me how that missed the edge
solid bat on ball and straight to mid-off, that was middled
the frustration gets to Kohli as he dances down the wicket to thrash this away and misses
Kohli uses his wrists well to flick this uppishly wide of midwicket, they must be praying for some gifts on the pads
143 kph, that was well left by Rohit, lands outside off and comes back in and sails over the off stump
139 kph, short and he does well to fend it with soft hands to the on side, no short leg though
Dropped by de Kock! Kohli gets a nasty lifter, tries to get his glove out of the way but the ball brushes it and goes towards de Kock's face, he grabs it and spills it, Morkel had started celebrating
fuller in length outside off and he leaves it alone
Kohli tries to pull and he plays it onto his body, on an Indian pitch that would have scurried to the square leg boundary
a bit too straight and Kohli clips it off the pads uppishly wide of square leg
outside edge and not in control of that at all, this was shaping towards the stumps, goes to third man
this was class! Phew! Looked like a forward push, this was full and moving away and he showed the full face of the bat and punched it wide of cover, effortless
well timed again, this was a length ball on the stumps and he shows the full face and punches it down the track and beats mid-on
switches to a fuller length and Kohli was prodding forward, close to the edge
this was a touch wider outside off and Kohli did well to leave this alone
yet another leading edge that lands safely, on the stumps and the edge falls wide of point
good length on the stumps and he safely defends it
shorter in length and he stood tall and punched it to the off side
143.9 kph, this was shorter and wider and Kohli couldn't resist going for it, played wide of his body and missed it completely
stays back and defends down the track and Morkel slips and falls while trying to collect it, he's fine
this was a skier! Kohli was targeting the long-on boundary and the ball dropped some yards after the 30-yard circle
shot! This was short and wide outside off, he gets across and thrashes it wide of cover
bowls that full and a touch wide outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
this was full and moving away and he steered it to the off side
he errs by straying wide down the leg side, loses his line
the temptation was there to go for the cut and he nearly edged it, shorter in length
135 kph, lands it on a good length outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
edged! Rohit decides to give the charge and flay at it and he gets an outside edge that fortunately clears Kallis at first slip
comes back in and skids through and clips his body and drops on the pitch
that was a tester for the batsman and keeper, extra bounce and Kohli pulled out of the hook and de Kock had to leap, he was down on the grass
punches it towards cover and sets off or a quick single
good leave by Rohit, this one was climbing and close to the off stump
oopsy! Another sharp bouncer and Rohit made room and had to really arch backwards to try and fetch it, nearly kissed the edge
friendlier length, safely punched towards cover and an easy single
a bit too straight and Rohit tucks this away down to midwicket
lands outside off and moves away and Kohli doesn't offer a shot
gets beside the line and Kohli angles this one down to third man, good running
lands outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
raw power from Kohli! He picked the shorter length early, moved across the stumps and fetched it in front of his face and pulled it wide of square leg and beat the sweeper
he loses his line by straying down the leg side
too wide outside the off stump
appeal for a caught behind! Nipped back in and there was a sound but it could've been ball hitting pad, Morkel had started celebrating, need to see another replay
angles it away from the right hander and he steers it down to third man
Kohli's class on show again! This was moving away from him and he showed the middle of the bat and effortlessly steered it wide of point
stays beside the line and punches it to the off side
he stays right behind the line and defends
a bit too straight and he clips it down to fine leg
lands it outside the off stump and it leaves the right hander, left alone
he stays back and steers it to the left of point and sets off for a quick single
bowls it full and wide outside off and Kohli's not tempted into playing at it
better line, comes back in from outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
safely pouched at first slip! Good delivery by McLaren, this was on a good length outside off, forced Kohli to play at it, ended up stabbing at the ball and the edge flew to Kallis at first slip
and Yuvraj gets a royal welcome! A nasty short one straight away, he was too late to react and the ball thudded onto his glove as he looked to fend it off

that's a terrific ball from McLaren that beat Yuvraj all ends up! From over the wicket, lands on middle on a good length, Yuvraj played all around it, the ball just brushed the pad and hit the top of the middle stump, the stumps are upright and the bails go flying, talk about accuracy from McLaren
hardly the most convincing boundary of the evening, short one from Parnell from over the wicket, he looked to fend it off, brushes the glove and races to fine leg
wide outside off and he stylishly cuts it to third man

Direct hit and Rohit's got to go! Superb athleticism by Miller at short cover, Raina pushed it with soft hands towards cover and set off quickly for a single, Rohit wasn't as quick off  the blocks and in the meantime Miller attacked the ball and in one motion under-armed it to the stumps on the dive, Rohit looked in trouble even at normal speed, the third umpire confirmed it
this was short and drifting down the leg side
oopsy! Dhoni fends one off his pads and the ball nearly dribbles towards the stumps, he manages to bat it out
on a good length and he gets forward and defends
this was fuller in length on the stumps and he defends it
pitches outside leg and Raina looks to tuck it away but the ball bounces a bit more and hits his pads
much better, stays back at the crease and stylishly works it away to the leg side
Dhoni walks right across the stumps and awkwardly defends, looks to cover the line
he shuffles across the stumps and safely pushes it to the off side
never a dull moment with Dhoni, shuffles across very quickly and squirts it out to mid-off and sets off for a quick single, there's an overthrow at the striker's end
Raina chases one that was full and wide and he nearly edges it
gets across his stumps early and looks to play across the line and the ball rises and clips his pads
Raina rode the bounce well on that occasion, went right back at the crease and fended it off
another short one and down the leg side, swiveled and pulled to fine leg
this was short of a length and he shuffles across in his own characteristic style and pulls to square leg
he stays back and punches this one to the off side
this was pitched up and straightening, had Dhoni poking at it and he missed it
Dhoni retaliates! Half volley outside off and Dhoni took a few paces forward and lofted it over the off side and the ball lands inches in front of the rope
walks across his stumps and steers it to the off side, not sure what he was trying to do
short down the leg side and Dhoni looks to pull and the ball nearly touches the back of the bat
rare lapse from South Africa, drifting down the leg side, he clips it with the angle and Morkel dives and has it covered but fumbles at fine leg
once again McLaren drifts down the leg side, he's struggling with his line
fullish outside off and he defends this one towards point
an exaggerated shuffle across the stumps, tucked away behind square, Dhoni's on skates
nice delivery just outside off and he just leaves it alone
Dhoni takes him to task by stepping down the track to state his intentions, forces it wide of midwicket and the fielder makes a valiant attempt to chase and try to pull it back
this was short and wide and Dhoni hops on his toes and punches it away
another unconventional attempt at a defensive shot, moves across and defends
shuffles across his stumps and knocks it ton the on side
nicely timed, this was on the pads, Raina likes it there, forced it away and used the pace on the ball to take it wide of square leg, the outfield does the rest
short of a length and he shuffles and tucks it to fine leg
short and wide and Raina stepped down the track a bit too early and ended up dabbing it to point
strange shot by Raina, fetched a short one from outside off and half-heartedly pulled it to square leg
Dropped by Miller at short cover! This was short and wide and he hopped on his toes to punch it, it traveled low to Miller who moved to his left and cupped his hands behind the ball, couldn't hang on
short one and he pulls this one down to fine leg
drifts down the leg side and short too
he rides the bounce well and turns it to the on side
stays beside the line and steers it to the off side
extra bounce and he hops at the crease and clips it to the on side
that was well played, picked the shorter length early and pulled it over midwicket, he was in full control of that
good length outside off and moving away and he leaves it alone
short and wide and cut away with force but straight to backward point
Raina hops and fends it to the off side, he appears more confident than some of his colleagues
he goes back at the crease and tucks it to the on side
the bouncer was too much even for de Kock! Down the leg side, and Raina looks to hook and misses

Appeal for a run out and Raina's in trouble! Raina pulled a short one from front of his face and placed it to deep square leg, he was challenging Steyn's arm, flat and accurate throw to de Kock, the wicketkeeper looks to collect it and the force of the ball takes his glove towards the stumps and Raina's dive is not enough. Initially it looked like a direct hit but an accurate throw nevertheless
on the pads and he gets off the mark with a clip to deep midwicket
good length outside off and he defends
he sprays this too wide outside the off stump
once again loses his line and fires this wide outside off
edgy, this was full and moving away and he poked his bat out, edged it wide of second slip
nervy poke by Jadeja outside the off stump, this one straightens
once again very tentative outside off as he pokes his bat at it
this was shorter and he simply flayed at it and missed it
moving away from the left-hander and he awkwardly pokes at it again
fuller in length and he stays behind the line to defend
fuller one and he leaves this one alone
moves away from him and he thrusts his pad forward and leaves it alone
he stays back at the crease and works it to square leg
edgy again, squared up on the back foot and the outside edge goes past the gap between slip and gully
good running, Dhoni pushes it softly towards short extra cover and sets off and Jadeja equal to the task, beats the throw
leaves the left-hander and he's happy to leave it alone
goes back and he works it to square leg
neatly driven, this was a half volley outside the off stump and he leans forward and drives him wide of extra cover, timing was crisp
slashes outside off and misses, Parnell gives him some width
follows it up with a sharp bouncer and falls over at the crease after delivery, Jadeja is in not position to play at it
good length outside off and defended to the off side
he poked at it outside the off stump and nearly edges it
Parnell has struggled on occasion with his line, too wide outside off
and this time he strays down the leg side and well done by de Kock
nicely driven, this was a half volley on the pads and he pushes it through the line and beats a diving mid-on
shot of intent, this was a length ball which Dhoni smashes across the line wide of midwicket, beats the fielder
chases one wide outside off and he chops it away to the off side
Jadeja's turning it on, this was a half volley on the pads and he lofts through the line and it's a couple of bounces to long-on
he gets behind the line and punches it to the off side
he shuffles across the stumps and knocks it to mid-on
gives him width and he neatly slices this one down to deep cover
starts off with a short one that Jadeja fails to put away, ends up mistiming it to mid-on
this was fuller on the pads and he clips it away down to midwicket
almost another run out! Tucked wide of midwicket and they push for a second run, the throw was to the keeper's end, they take an overthrow too
spanked away but it was a terrible ball too, too wide outside off and he moves across and bashes it wide of cover, the sweeper dives and fails to cut it off
good length outside off and moving away and he leaves it alone
shapes away from him and he leaves it alone
fetches a full ball from outside off and drags it towards mid-on
stays beside the line and punches it towards cover
fullish in length outside off and moving away and he safely leaves it alone
lands it outside the off stump and he doesn't offer a shot
how did that not take the edge? Landed on the off stump and moved away slightly, bowler unlucky there
good comeback by RJ, down the track to a length ball and thumped it over mid-on who leaps in despair
tries to flick it away and the ball clips his pads and rolls away
he tucks it wide of mid-on for a single
outside edge and he safely places it wide of slip and down to third man
Wide No.15 -  a number that might be forgotten at the end of the day - SA have struggled on occasion, down the leg side
shaping away and he leaves it to the keeper

Through the gate! From over the wicket, pitched up on the stumps, looked to drive through the off side but left a gap between pad and bat, the ball nips back in and pegs back the middle stump, the Old Fox Kallis has struck
Ashwin stays back and tucks it to the on side
he goes back at the crease and defends to the off side
stays beside the line and cuts him down to sweeper cover
down the leg side and Ashwin shuffles and tucks it away easily down to fine leg
short delivery and he stays back and defends this one
he stays back and pulls this one over midwicket, lands safely
short of a length, he goes back and punches it to cover
he stays beside the line and pushes this one down to point
excellent timing! Good length on off and middle and he uses his wrists well and clips it wide of midwicket
on the pads and he easily clips it behind square on the on side
outside off and shapes away and he leaves it alone
on the pads and he clips it away to the fine leg
these wides are making us tired, once again down the leg side
drifts on the pads and he tucks it away to fine leg
good length outside the off stump and he stays back and defends
in the midst of the gloom for India are shots like these from Ashwin, picks the shorter length early and clubs it over midwicket in front of square, that rocketed off the bat
good length on the off stump and he stays back and defends
poor ball and put away, this was short and wide outside off and Ashwin stands tall and slaps it over backward point
he stays back and stabs it down to mid-off
skids through and hits the top of the pads and rolls away
he hits a good length on off and middle and he stays back and defends
Dhoni gets a shorter one from Morkel, hurried him with his pace and bounce and the ball hits his body and rolls away
another one and he stands tall and punches it to the off side
this was a good one to Ashwin, rising up and he poked his bat out not knowing how to play at it
he stays back and punches it towards point
another one leaves the right-hander and Ashwin fishes at it
moves away from the right-hander and he flashes at it
down the leg side and it's wide No.17, nuff said
Dhoni comes down the pitch and deliberately glides it down to third man
drifts on the pads and he tucks it to the on side

there was a sound as the ball passed the batsman and McLaren and the umpire were convinced, Ashwin didn't seem so. It nipped back in and Ashwin was playing from the crease, there was a gap between pad and bat, could have taken the inside edge or the top of the pad. It certainly clipped the top of the pad, was there an edge as well? Not convincing. You could say that Ashwin was unlucky
this was too wide outside off
lands outside off and it leaves the right hander
shapes away and he leves it alone
and immediately Dhoni looks to clear the infield, short one and he rocks back and pulls over midwicket, Lopsy chases
another short one and Dhoni picks the length early and pulls over square leg, just lands in front of the rope
he tucks it towards midwicket and Bhuvi sets off but has to scamper back
he stays right behind the line and defends
this lands wide outside off and he watchfully sees it through to the keeper
extra bounce this time and he fends it to the off side
142.9 kph, cranking the pace up at the start of a new spell, outside off and too quick for the tailender
that was too quick for Bhuvneshwar, this was fired outside off and moving away, the batsman chased the angle and offered a low catch to Kallis at second slip
fires that outside off and he safely leaves it alone
hits a good length on the stumps and he stays behind the line and defends
close call for Mohit as the ball skids towards the stumps and just manages to get his bat behind the line
Dhoni reaches his fifty with a commanding six over long-off! Comes forward and gets under a half volley, lofts over long-off
throwing his bat at everything, short and he swings and the outside edge clears the keeper, the 200's up
looked like the slower ball, Dhoni was forward and he fended it off his handle and it dropped short of the keeper, de Kock deflected it to fine leg
this was short and wide outside off and punched to the off side
fends it off with soft hands to the off side and sets off quickly to retain the strike
this was full and drilled down to long-on and Dhoni refuses the single
good length on middle and leg and he shuffles and clips it to deep square leg, Dhoni's not budging
fullish in length outside off and he drives firmly but can't beat  cover
in the slot for Dhoni, this was short and on the body, he picked the length early and clubbed it wide of midwicket, raced away
opens the face and steers it to third man and Dhoni takes the single
Mohit safely leaves this one alone to the keeper
drifts on the body and he nudges it off the body to the on side
drifts on the body and he nudges it off his hips to the on side
drifts wide down the leg side
a short one and he looks to pull, the ball deflects off the body to the off side
this was a touch wide and he hits it straight to backward point
forget about chasing it, this was short and wide outside off and he spanks it wide of cover, packed off side field
drifts on the body and he tucks it to the on side to retain the strike
tucks it away down to fine leg and Dhoni decides not to run, he was a bit disappointed there was no chance for a second there
Steyn bangs it in short and his exertions cost him 5 wides, too much for de Kock to do
chops it on! This was a length ball which Dhoni looked to force away to the off side, inside edge and the ball bounces once before pegging back the leg stump, his lone vigil ends
fires it straight and he gets solidly behind it to defend
this was short outside off and he flays at it but misses
stabs at this one and it lobs up and lands well short of cover
a simple return catch to end the mauling! Pitched up on the stumps and Shami gets forward and chips it back to Steyn, a catch as easy as the win for the hosts
